item.title: Analysing Movie Genre Popularity with imdb Data
item.description: When it comes to hobbies, films and listening to podcasts / youtube videos of people talking about films is one of my favorites. For a while now, I was interested in approaching this hobby in a data-driven manner. I stumbled upon[this old rStudio blog post])https://blog.rstudio.com/2014/11/24/rvest-easy-web-scraping-with-r/) by none other than Hadley Wickham himself. After reading it, I wanted to try web-scraping with selectorgadget myself and imdb seemed like a great place to start.

item.title: World Cup Winner - Finals Edition
item.description: Like promised, here is the updated plot after the finals: As it turns out, France is the clear favorite to win the World Cup tomorrow. On average, the probability of France winning is around 70% and for Croatia, the underdog, the probability based on the odds is around 30%. If you want to know more, see my original blog post. Good luck to both teams tomorrow :)
